title: Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka☆Magica Gaiden PVs

alternative_titles.en: Puella Magi Madoka Magica Side Story: Magia Record
alternative_titles.ja: マギアレコード 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ外伝

synopsis:
The new heroine of Magia Record is Iroha, a magical girl on the hunt for her missing sister Ui in Kamihama. Also in Kamihama is Madoka, who's searching for the similarly-missing Homura.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
